snippet.title: Just Keep Running - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD THE GAME on Itch.io ▶▶ https://imiself.itch.io/jkr
OR DOWNLOAD on GameJolt ▶▶ https://gamejolt.com/games/jkr/765021
OR DOWNLOAD on IndieDB ▶▶ https://www.indiedb.com/games/just-keep-running

Official Gameplay Trailer of Just Keep Running, a free 3D Action-Puzzle Platformer game by I.M.I.Self

Currently, you can only play through Chapter 1 of the game. More chapters are in development, and for the first two chapters, the game will be released entirely for free! What happens from there on is a mystery even to us, but we do hope you join us for the ride!

🌒🌓🌕 More From I.M.I.Self 🌕🌗🌘
JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER ▶▶ https://discord.gg/3zdCvHWpYy

🔹🔶 About Just Keep Running 🔷🔸
🎮 - Just Keep Running is a parkour platformer with elements of problem-solving and speedy puzzles and a revealing story about superhumans, governmental ethics, and the future.

🏃 - Quickly navigate your way through test chambers made to not only challenge your quick wit but also your ability to execute your plans swiftly. Challenge yourself by climbing the ranks and beating your previous best times.

💭 - Visually inspired by voxel-based games like Teardown, The Touryst, and Cloudpunk, with gameplay inspired by Mirror's Edge, the Portal series, and Ultrakill.

#justkeeprunning #gametrailers #indiegame #itchio #gamejolt #indiedev
